name: Oathbreaker - Prologue
description:
Prologue chapter of Oathbreaker, an episodic online free to play medieval fantasy Otome game released on rinmarugames.com.

To play the rest of the chapters, please go to rinmarugames.com.

  • Completely free to play. No micro transaction etc.
  • 3 male and 2 female love interests.
  • limited character customization. (Female protagonist with 5 skin and hair color presets)
  • Changable name.
  • 3 personality types.
  • animated sprites.
  • animated and non-animated CGs.

You can find the optional NSFW version on my patreon page with animated CGs and sfx.

Bugs/Known errors:

May take some time to load.

May get stuck between loading screens.

Only works on Firefox, Chrome or Safari. (Best on Firefox)

Saving may get stuck sometimes. (Using limited amount of save files recommended.)

May have trouble loading Live2D sprites due to ram issues.
